title: Stock Futures Waver, Bond Yields Drop on Covid Concerns
sub_head: Dollar strengthens, while U.S. and European government bonds rally
body:
U.S. stock futures were mixed and bond yields declined amid rising Covid-19 cases and an acceleration of restrictions in Europe.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 edged down 0.2% Friday, the broad-market index closed up 0.3% at an all-time high. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures declined 0.4%. Nasdaq-100 futures climbed 0.3%, pointing to advances in technology stocks after the opening bell.
